author: Reuters Editorial
title: What you need to know about the coronavirus right now
description: Here's what you need to know about the coronavirus right now:
content:
(Reuters) - Here’s what you need to know about the coronavirus right now: 
WHO China-centric, organisation “blew it”, Trump says 
“The W.H.O. really blew it,” Trump said in a Twitter post on Tuesday, calling the agency “China centric”. He later repeated the… [+2079 chars]
